title: Woman killed in northeast Las Vegas shooting
content:
LAS VEGAS (FOX5) -
Las Vegas Metro police said they are investigating after a woman was killed in a shooting early Saturday morning.
Police said they responded to reports of a woman heard crying for help at 2:41 a.m. in the 3800 block of Terrazzo Avenue, near Cheyenne Avenue and Las Vegas Boulevard.
Arriving officers found a woman lying in the doorway of a townhome with an apparent gunshot wound.
"She was saying help me I'm dying," said Anna Briseno, made the emergency call.
The woman was transported to University Medical Center, where she later died from her injuries, police said.
Investigators believe the shooting occurred just outside the doorway to the residence. The woman then fell in the doorway, where officers found her.
The family confirmed that the woman killed was Denise Gray.
Police remained on the scene for hours collecting evidence, but said they do not have a suspect in custody.
The identity of the victim will be confirmed once released by the Clark County Coroner’s Office.
Anyone with information on this incident is urged to contact Crime Stoppers at 702-385-5555.
